experience.title: Associate Product Manager
experience.description: ° Developed comprehensive sales collateral for company products, including employment verification suite, VKYC, CKYC, Face Liveness, and Face Match, enhancing product understanding and sales effectiveness.° Conducted a detailed competitive analysis among different vendors for a specific API, facilitating informed vendor selection and boosting performance results.° Collaborated with cross-functional teams, including data science, to design and implement a categorization template that enhanced user expense categorization and reporting accuracy.° Participated in the revamping of the enterprise portal, which led to increased customer retention and acquisition. Responsibilities included gathering user feedback, creating wireframes, and monitoring the portal’s functionality post-deployment to ensure optimal performance.° Authored detailed product requirement documents, improving team understanding of product specifications and enhancing communication across different teams.
experience.description_html: ° Developed comprehensive sales collateral for company products, including employment verification suite, VKYC, CKYC, Face Liveness, and Face Match, enhancing product understanding and sales effectiveness.° Conducted a detailed competitive analysis among different vendors for a specific API, facilitating informed vendor selection and boosting performance results.° Collaborated with cross-functional teams, including data science, to design and implement a categorization template that enhanced user expense categorization and reporting accuracy.° Participated in the revamping of the enterprise portal, which led to increased customer retention and acquisition. Responsibilities included gathering user feedback, creating wireframes, and monitoring the portal’s functionality post-deployment to ensure optimal performance.° Authored detailed product requirement documents, improving team understanding of product specifications and enhancing communication across different teams.

experience.title: Next Leap Product Manager Fellowship
experience.description: ° Successfully completed a comprehensive Product Management Fellowship, focusing on product strategy, user research, and agile methodologies.° Collaborated with experienced mentors to develop practical skills in product development, market analysis, and data-driven decision-making.° Led hands-on projects, implementing product roadmaps and launching features to enhance user experience.° Engaged in extensive networking opportunities, connecting with industry professionals and expanding professional network.° Acquired in-depth knowledge of product lifecycle management, competitive analysis, and stakeholder communication.

education.title: Dr. A.P.J. Abdul Kalam Technical University
